Final settlement refers to the process where an employee completes all necessary formalities and receives all dues owed by the company upon leaving the organization. The final settlement typically includes settling pending salaries, allowances, bonuses, unused leaves, provident fund balance, and any other outstanding amounts.

In the case of Uta Melmar, the final settlement process would involve clearance from various departments such as Accounts, IT, Administration, and possibly Marketing, ensuring all dues are cleared, and submitting required forms for full and final settlement processing at the HR department.

The entire final settlement process usually takes around 30 days, as per the mentioned process.
